responses.name: 100 Continue
responses.description: The server has received the request headers and the client should proceed to send the request body.

responses.name: 101 Switching Protocols
responses.description: The requester has asked the server to switch protocols, and the server has agreed to do so.

responses.name: 102 Processing
responses.description: The server has received and is processing the request, but no response is available yet.

responses.name: 103 Early Hints
responses.description: Used to return some response headers before final HTTP message.

responses.name: 200 OK
responses.description: The request has succeeded.

responses.name: 201 Created
responses.description: The request has been fulfilled and resulted in a new resource being created.

responses.name: 202 Accepted
responses.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed.

responses.name: 203 Non-Authoritative Information
responses.description: The server is a transforming proxy that received a 200 OK from its origin, but is returning a modified version of the origin's response.

responses.name: 204 No Content
responses.description: The server successfully processed the request, and is not returning any content.

responses.name: 205 Reset Content
responses.description: The server successfully processed the request, asks that the requester reset its document view, and is not returning any content.

responses.name: 206 Partial Content
responses.description: The server is delivering only part of the resource due to a range header sent by the client.

responses.name: 207 Multi-Status
responses.description: The message body that follows is an XML message and can contain a number of separate response codes.

responses.name: 208 Already Reported
responses.description: The members of a DAV binding have already been enumerated in a preceding part of the response.

responses.name: 226 IM Used
responses.description: The server has fulfilled a request for the resource, and the response is a representation of the result of one or more instance-manipulations applied to the current instance.

responses.name: 300 Multiple Choices
responses.description: Indicates multiple options for the resource from which the client may choose.

responses.name: 301 Moved Permanently
responses.description: This and all future requests should be directed to the given URI.

responses.name: 302 Found
responses.description: Tells the client to look at another URL.

responses.name: 303 See Other
responses.description: The response to the request can be found under another URI using the GET method.

responses.name: 304 Not Modified
responses.description: Indicates that the resource has not been modified since the version specified by the request headers.

responses.name: 305 Use Proxy
responses.description: The requested resource is available only through a proxy, the address for which is provided in the response.

responses.name: 306 Switch Proxy
responses.description: No longer used. Originally meant 'Subsequent requests should use the specified proxy.'

responses.name: 307 Temporary Redirect
responses.description: In this case, the request should be repeated with another URI; however, future requests should still use the original URI.

responses.name: 308 Permanent Redirect
responses.description: The request and all future requests should be repeated using another URI.

responses.name: 400 Bad Request
responses.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

responses.name: 401 Unauthorized
responses.description: The client must authenticate itself to get the requested response.

responses.name: 402 Payment Required
responses.description: Reserved for future use.

responses.name: 403 Forbidden
responses.description: The client does not have access rights to the content.

responses.name: 404 Not Found
responses.description: The server can not find the requested resource.

responses.name: 405 Method Not Allowed
responses.description: The request method is known by the server but is not supported by the target resource.

responses.name: 406 Not Acceptable
responses.description: The server cannot produce a response matching the list of acceptable values defined in the request's proactive content negotiation headers.

responses.name: 407 Proxy Authentication Required
responses.description: The client must first authenticate itself with the proxy.

responses.name: 408 Request Timeout
responses.description: The server would like to shut down this unused connection.

responses.name: 409 Conflict
responses.description: The request conflicts with the current state of the server.

responses.name: 410 Gone
responses.description: The content has been permanently deleted from server, with no forwarding address.

responses.name: 411 Length Required
responses.description: The server refuses to accept the request without a defined Content-Length header.

responses.name: 412 Precondition Failed
responses.description: The client has indicated preconditions in its headers that the server does not meet.

responses.name: 413 Payload Too Large
responses.description: Request entity is larger than limits defined by server.

responses.name: 414 URI Too Long
responses.description: The URI requested by the client is longer than the server is willing to interpret.

responses.name: 415 Unsupported Media Type
responses.description: The media format of the requested data is not supported by the server.

responses.name: 416 Range Not Satisfiable
responses.description: The range specified by the Range header field in the request can't be fulfilled.

responses.name: 417 Expectation Failed
responses.description: The expectation given in the request's Expect header could not be met.

responses.name: 418 I'm a teapot
responses.description: The server refuses the attempt to brew coffee with a teapot.

responses.name: 421 Misdirected Request
responses.description: The request was directed at a server that is not able to produce a response.

responses.name: 422 Unprocessable Content
responses.description: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

responses.name: 423 Locked
responses.description: The resource that is being accessed is locked.

responses.name: 424 Failed Dependency
responses.description: The request failed due to failure of a previous request.

responses.name: 425 Too Early
responses.description: Indicates that the server is unwilling to risk processing a request that might be replayed.

responses.name: 426 Upgrade Required
responses.description: The client should switch to a different protocol.

responses.name: 428 Precondition Required
responses.description: The origin server requires the request to be conditional.

responses.name: 429 Too Many Requests
responses.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.

responses.name: 431 Request Header Fields Too Large
responses.description: The server is unwilling to process the request because its header fields are too large.

responses.name: 451 Unavailable For Legal Reasons
responses.description: The user-agent requested a resource that cannot legally be provided.

responses.name: 500 Internal Server Error
responses.description: The server has encountered a situation it doesn't know how to handle.

responses.name: 501 Not Implemented
responses.description: The request method is not supported by the server and cannot be handled.

responses.name: 502 Bad Gateway
responses.description: The server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, received an invalid response from the upstream server.

responses.name: 503 Service Unavailable
responses.description: The server is not ready to handle the request.

responses.name: 504 Gateway Timeout
responses.description: The server is acting as a gateway and cannot get a response in time.

responses.name: 505 HTTP Version Not Supported
responses.description: The HTTP version used in the request is not supported by the server.

responses.name: 506 Variant Also Negotiates
responses.description: Transparent content negotiation for the request results in a circular reference.

responses.name: 507 Insufficient Storage
responses.description: The server is unable to store the representation needed to complete the request.

responses.name: 508 Loop Detected
responses.description: The server detected an infinite loop while processing the request.

responses.name: 510 Not Extended
responses.description: Further extensions to the request are required for the server to fulfill it.

responses.name: 511 Network Authentication Required
responses.description: The client needs to authenticate to gain network access.
